attributes.action: Provide cost of living increase in salary to NHS staff
attributes.additional_details:
The 5th July 2020 is an opportunity. The NHS has been hailed as heroic, lionised, celebrated and rewarded. We now need to make the actual step of recognising that with annual inflationary salary increase.

Parliament went home along with most of the nation yet frequently get pay increases form independent bodies. Parliament has declared that it is safe for many to return but are yet to return themselves. A telling factor on why it should be more attractive to work for the NHS.
attributes.background: Get the Government to commit to provide cost of living wage increases to NHS staff, based on their own inflation indices
